name: Body Press
description: You slam into your target with your body. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing 2d6 + MOVE fighting damage on a hit. If your size is at least one category greater than the target's size, deal an additional MOVE fighting damage.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 4d6 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.
